all_mutual_friends.about: All friends that the viewer and the target person have in common. This includes the friends who do not use your app.

mutual_friends.about: Social context edge providing a list of Facebook friends that have logged into the app that the viewer and the target person have in common.

mutual_likes.about: Social context edge providing a list of the liked Pages that the calling person and the target person have in common.

three_degree_mutual_friends.about: Friends of the viewer who are mutual friends with the target and have the app installed.
